modShortDescription: Neopolitan, because who eats just the vanilla? This Collection Mod should be considered Vanilla+, and contains the combined code of over 100 mods.
modDescription:
**Neopolitan – A Collection Mod – A19.3** – Neopolitan, because who eats just the vanilla?

## What Exactly Is a Collection Mod?

This is a term some others on the 7DTD Official Discord helped Shouden Kalferas formulate. A collection mod is a single mod that is combined from the code of many other mods.

## What Is This Neopolitan Mod?

This Collection Mod should be considered Vanilla+, and contains the combined code of over 100 mods from a wide variety of authors. This mod collection is the same one he use on his server and all are tested, error & warning free, and work well together. The specific list of mods is outlined below. These mods are selected for their Quality of Life (QoL) improvements over vanilla game play. There are no rainbow zombies, instant crafting, super-powerful weapons, or substantial changes to game play. Anyone familiar with and who enjoys playing the vanilla game would be able to play this collection comfortably. He’s confident after playing this collection, you’ll find many or most of the mods near-requirements for any future games you play.

## What if You Don’t Want All the Mods Included?

With this Neopolitan collection mod, he will also provide a zipfile download where you can download all the mods broken out individually in their original form. This will allow you to remove an individual mod from the collection.

## With Over 100 Mods Included, How Do You Keep This Updated to Each Author’s Newest Changes?

He wrote a set of scripts that downloads the newest mod code for each of the mods and automatically compiles them all together to create this collection mod (and the associated zip file with all the mods separated). This way, he offload the task to each author to keep their mod updated or improved.

## What About Fixes You’ve Implemented for Broken Mods?

Some of the mods he used in this collection mod were either broken, had errors, or otherwise needed tuned to match the rest of the mods in this pack. For these, he does keep a separate branched set of code for the mod that contains the modified code. There are only a handful (17 at the time of this writing) that fall into this category.

## List of Mods

* **[60Slot\_Bag\_30Reserve](https://7daystodiemods.com/60-slot-backpack-with-30-reserve/) by ShoudenKalferas, Based on Khaine’s 60BBM**  
   * Description: 60 Slot Bag, with 30 Slots for the player to earn.
* **[Crafting Acid](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/7DTD-Acid) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Create Bottles of Acid from Acid, Mouldy Bread, and Diseased Meat.
* **[Meat Rendering](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/7DTD-MeatRendering) by Shouden Kalferas, originating idea from Aeyvi Kalferas**  
   * Description: Render animal fat from diseased meat.
* **[Quenchiest Cactus Juice](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/7DTD-Quenchiest_Cactus_Juice) by Shouden Kalferas, originating idea from Aeyvi Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to obtain murky water from cactuses.
* **[Craftable Sewing Kit](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/7DTD-SewingKit) by Shouden Kalferas, originating idea from Aeyvi Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to craft the sewing kit.
* **[Steel Trussing Sheet](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/7DTD-SteelTrussingSheet) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds a steel trussing sheet.
* **[8-slot Crafting Queue](https://7daystodiemods.com/12-slot-crafting-queue/) by KhaineGB, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/8CraftQueue) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: This mod changes the players crafting queue from 4 slots to 8 slots.
* **[Better Goggles](https://7daystodiemods.com/better-goggles/) by GneX, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/BetterGoggles) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Improved Aviator Goggles, Ski Goggles and Shades.
* **[Death by Campfire](https://7daystodiemods.com/death-by-campfire/) by magejosh**  
   * Description: More heatmap strength from campfires and they set you on fire for longer now.
* **[Delmod\_Combiner](https://7daystodiemods.com/combiner/) by DelStryker**  
   * Description: Adds the Combiner capability to the Workbench and the Vehicles.
* **[Return of the Jail Door](https://7daystodiemods.com/delmod-jail-door/) by DelStryker**  
   * Description: Jail door.
* **[Delmod\_Stack\_Sizes](https://7daystodiemods.com/delmod-stack-sizes/) by DelStryker, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Delmod_Stack_Sizes) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Changes some item stack sizes.
* **[Doughs Buff Ambience Darker Inside](https://7daystodiemods.com/buff-ambiance-darker-inside/) by Doughphunghus [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Doughs-Buff-Ambiance-DarkerInside) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Modifications and additions to make it the darkest indoors.
* **[Doughs Buff Ambience DarkerNights](https://7daystodiemods.com/buff-ambiance-darker-nights/) by Doughphunghus [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Doughs-Buff-Ambiance-DarkerNights) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Modifications and additions to make it the darkest at night.
* **[Doughs Buff Infection](https://7daystodiemods.com/buff-infection/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Makes infections more deadly.
* **[Doughs Buff Pipe Bombs](https://7daystodiemods.com/more-pipe-bombs/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Modifications and additions to pipe bomb related items.
* **[Doughs – Food – Sous Chef Of The Apocalypse](https://7daystodiemods.com/sous-chef-of-the-apocalypse/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Additional fancy food and recipes.
* **[Doughs Nerf Flashlights and Lanterns](https://7daystodiemods.com/nerf-flashlights-and-player-crafted-lanterns/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Makes flashlights and placeable lanters very hard to craft/obtain.
* **[Doughs Punishing Weather Core](https://7daystodiemods.com/punishing-weather-core/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Makes the weather more challenging to deal with.
* **[Doughs Punishing Weather Effects Light](https://7daystodiemods.com/punishing-weather-effects-light/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Lessens particle effects from Doughs-PunishingWeather-Core to help with FPS.
* **[Doughs UI Add 5 Recipe Ingredients](https://7daystodiemods.com/add-five-recipe-ingredients-ui/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Adds 5 more visible ingredient slots for recipes.
* **[Doughs You’ve Got Mail](https://7daystodiemods.com/youve-got-mail/) by Doughphunghus**  
   * Description: Adds interesting postal mail with fun semi useful items.
* **[DrPrepper](https://7daystodiemods.com/dr-prepper-mod/) by stample**  
   * Description: This mod adds the Dr. Prepper drink to slightly increase run speed and carry capacity. It can be found in vending machines and beverage loot.
* **[EmperorDye](https://7daystodiemods.com/clear-dye-cosmetic-mod/) by stample**  
   * Description: This mod adds a ‘Emperor Dye’ that essentially removes the UMA mesh of whatever armor piece its put into.
* **[Armor With Mods](https://7daystodiemods.com/armor-and-cloth-sold-with-mods/) by Okami**  
   * Description: Traders can sale armor with installed mods!
* **[Traders](https://7daystodiemods.com/guns-and-tools-sold-with-mods/) by Okami**  
   * Description: Traders trade weapons with mods.
* **[Frobscottle](https://7daystodiemods.com/frobscottle-mod/) by stample**  
   * Description: This mod adds the Frobscottle drink to increase jump height and make fun farty noises.
* **[GhillieSuitAsMods](https://7daystodiemods.com/ghillie-suit-mod/) by stample**  
   * Description: This mod changes the Ghillie Suit clothing pieces into mods for head/jacket/pants. It also removes the original items and recipes so you can’t put a ghillie mod in a ghillie suit.
* **[Guppycur’s Random ZombieGetterUpper](https://7daystodiemods.com/random-getter-upper/) by Guppycur**  
   * Description: Got the timing down pat for their get up speed? Well, let’s fix that!
* **[H7SB Seats](https://7daystodiemods.com/h7sb-seats/) by Eihwaz**  
   * Description: Contains vanillafriendly chairs and sofas to sit on.
* **[H7SB Storage](https://7daystodiemods.com/h7sb-carts/) by Eihwaz**  
   * Description: Contains vanillafriendly pushable carts and new storages/changed storage sizes.
* **[Headshot\_15](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Bag_Bellows_Headshot/tree/master/Headshot_15) by ShoudenKalferas, Based on TSBX 25 Percent Headshot**  
   * Description: 15% Inrease Headshot Damage.
* **[Home\_Depot](https://7daystodiemods.com/home-depot-mod/) by OrbitalBliss, [Fixed](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Home_Depot) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds a bunch of miscellaneous items, mostly decorative, to the Traders. Adds a few contruction recipes, mostly tablesaw. Moves or Adds a couple Recipes to Perks.
* **[IceBurg\_Baby\_Animals](https://7daystodiemods.com/baby-animals/) by IceBurg, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/IceBurg_Baby_Animals_1_6) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Add baby animals to the game for Alpha 19.
* **[IceBurg\_Craft\_Windows](https://7daystodiemods.com/craft-windows/) by IceBurg [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/IceBurg_Craft_Windows_1_0) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds recipes to be able to craft all the different Vanilla windows.
* **[JaxTeller718\_BiggerWanderingHordes](https://7daystodiemods.com/increased-wandering-horde-size/) by JaxTeller718**  
   * Description: Makes a slight increase to the size of vanilla wandering hordes.
* **[JaxTeller718\_EggsInFridges](https://7daystodiemods.com/eggs-in-fridges/) by JaxTeller718**  
   * Description: Adds Eggs to Fridges.
* **[JaxTeller718\_SlowerProgression](https://7daystodiemods.com/slower-levelling/) by JaxTeller718**  
   * Description: Raises XP Needed to Level from 10000 to 12545.
* **[JaxTeller718\_ZombieSightRange](https://7daystodiemods.com/increased-zombie-sight-against-players/) by JaxTeller718**  
   * Description: Increases the range that zombies can see and sense you.
* **[Khaine’s HP Bar Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/hp-bars/) by KhaineGB [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/KHA19-HPBars) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: This mod adds the HP bar back into the game.
* **[Zombie Stutter Stop Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-stutter-stop/) by KhaineGB**  
   * Description: Forces the game to load most vanilla zombie models before the player spawns in.
* **[Khelldon – Bigger Buck and Doe](https://7daystodiemods.com/bigger-buck-and-doe/) by Khelldon**  
   * Description: Makes the Buck and Doe bigger
* **MeanCloud’s Increased Animals by Mean.Cloud, Doughphungus, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/MeanCloud_IncreasedAnimals) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Returns some of the huntable animals to the world since they don’t spawn too often anymore.
* **[NakedGator](https://7daystodiemods.com/naked-gator/) by stample**  
   * Description: This mod adds the Naked Gator drink to the game. It can be crafted using Mega Crush.
* **[Pickup\_Plants\_A19](https://7daystodiemods.com/pick-up-plants/) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Allows press E to pickup all plants. Based on Ragsy2145’s Pickup\_Plants Mod.
* **[Ragsy\_Brighter\_Vehicle\_Headlights\_V2](https://7daystodiemods.com/brighter-vehicle-headlights/) by Ragsy2145, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Ragsy_Brighter_Headlights_V2) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Support added for Custom Vehicles by Manux and Guppycur.
* **[Riles-DecoBlock](https://7daystodiemods.com/riles-deco-blocks/) by Riles**  
   * Description: One block to choose LARGE variety of decorations from.
* **[Riles-Fixes](https://7daystodiemods.com/riles-fixes/) by Riles**  
   * Description: A bunch of fixes. Readme has more details.
* **[Riles-HUDPlus](https://7daystodiemods.com/agf-hudplus/) by Riles**  
   * Description: A19.1 HUD adds more info yet is simple.
* **[Riles-SeatingPlus](https://7daystodiemods.com/riles-seatingplus/) by Riles**  
   * Description: Two people on motorcycle. Five people on truck!
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Battery Bank](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-BatteryBank) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench batteries from POIs and potentially obtain user-placable batteries.
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Generator Bank](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-GeneratorBank) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench generators from POIs and potentially obtain user-placable generators.
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Lights](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-Lights) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench lights from POIs and potentially obtain user-placable lights.
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Parts](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-Parts) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench electric parts from POIs and potentially obtain user-placable items.
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Signs](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-Signs) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench signs from POIs and potentially obtain user-placable signs.
* **[Salvaged Electronics – Solar Bank](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-SalvagedElectronics/tree/master/SalvagedElectronics-SolarBank) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds ability to wrench a solar bank off a roof and potentially obtain a working bank and solar cells.
* **[Some\_Skillbook\_Skillpoints](https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Skillbook_Skillpoints/archive/master.zip) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Give a skillpoint after reading all, some, or most skill books.
* **[Stainless Steel Returns](https://7daystodiemods.com/stainless-steel-returns-for-a18/) by Claymore, [Fixed](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Stainless_Steel_Returns) By ShoudenKalferas**  
   * Description: Adds back steel polish and polished steel. You have to find a recipe, or learn it via perk. Modified the explosion resistance. You can now find polish in various containers, but rare!
* **[StamplesDefenseQuests](https://7daystodiemods.com/stamples-defense-quests/) by stample**  
   * Description: Defense Quests creates a couple quests that send waves of zeds at you while you defend random T1 and T2 locations. Special thanks to geengaween for providing the ideas that led to this.
* **[StamplesNotJustLumberjacks](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stamplesmods/7d2dmodlets/tree/master/StamplesNotJustLumberjacks) by stample**  
   * Description: Add some other zombies into ZombieSnow group so wanderers in Snow are 100% lumberjacks
* **[Foods That use Super Corn](https://7daystodiemods.com/super-corn-cooked-foods/) by Gopher, [Fixed](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/SuperCornCookedFoods) By Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds different foods that use Super Corn.
* **[Terrain Based Movement Speed](https://7daystodiemods.com/terrain-based-movement-speed/) by Elucidus [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Terrain_Based_Movement_Speed) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: This changes how fast you walk/run based on the terrain you are standing on. It ranges from +35% on asphalt, to -25% on ice. \*warning the zombies get the same changes.
* **[Trader\_Refresh\_1Day](https://7daystodiemods.com/trader-refresh-1-day/) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Set all traders to refresh each day.
* **[Vanilla Expanded – Storage](https://7daystodiemods.com/vanilla-expanded-storage/) by TSBX [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Vanilla_Expanded_Storage) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Adds new immersive storage options.
* **[White River Tools of Citizenship](https://7daystodiemods.com/white-river-tools-of-citizenship/) by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Extend White River quest line to allow player to craft fabled equipment through collecting a lot of resources.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Amelia Earhart’s Gyrocopter by Shouden Kalferas and Aeyvi-Daro**  
   * Description: Find a rare item, craft a super-difficult item, and piece together a rare fast gyrocopter.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Bambi’s Bow by Shouden Kalferas, and morggin**  
   * Description: Gather tons of wood and craft a bunch of Wooden Bow’s to obtain a named Compound Bow.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Bear Claws by Shouden Kalferas with help from SteamM0nkey**  
   * Description: Fend off a horde of bears and obtain the rare set of flaming bear claws!
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Black Bart’s Flaming Dig Tools by ShoudenKalferas, morggin(lore), AeyviKalferas(Quest), RichardPaul(Poem)**  
   * Description: Gather tons of iron and craft a bunch of Iron Pickaxe and Shovels to obtain a set of named Flaming Steel Shovel and Pickaxe tools.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Brass for Lead by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather tons of lead and receive brass in return.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Bunyan’s FireAxe by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod.**  
   * Description: Help the Trader stock up on water in exchange for a branded Paul Bunyan FireAxe
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Callinicus Greek Fire by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Convert fire arrows to Callinicus Greek Fire.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Daryl’s Zombie-Killer Crossbow by Shouden Kalferas, and morggin**  
   * Description: Gather tons of wood and craft a bunch of Wooden Bow’s to obtain a named Compound Bow.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Deschain’s Revolver by Aeyvi and Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Collect all 8 books of the Dark Tower Series and craft 19 doors for the Tower. In exchange, receive Roland Deschain’s Revolver and schematics to make matching gold and silver bullets.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Dundee’s Hunting Knife by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: The settlement needs bone knives for their carcass carving class. Craft tons of bone knives in exchange for a named Hunting Knife.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Dwarven Forge by Shouden Kalferas, with code from Khaine’s 3-Slot Forge**  
   * Description: A faster smelting bellows inspired from the blacksmith experts from the Lord of the Rings.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Everdeen’s Arrows by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather food to help feed the settlement and in exchange they’ll offer you premium named arrows or bolts.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Gupta’s First Aid Bandages by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather tons of aloe leaves and receive some first aid bandages in return.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Jason’s Machete by Wyldwitchykat’s addition to the White River TOC mods by ShoudenKalferas**  
   * Description: Receive a named machete in exchange for providing hunting knives to the settlement.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Kuva’s Red and Blue Armor by Shouden and Aeyvi Kalferas**  
   * Description: Learn the secret recipe of Kuva’s Red Armor and learn to craft it yourself.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Leon’s Modded SMG by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather tons of pistols to help equip the settlement, then repair the degredaded weapon to ultimately obtain a premium named SMG.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Pavlichenko’s Rifle by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather the pieces to the famed Pavlichenko Rifle.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Quick Drying Concrete Blocks by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Turn in tons of wet concrete block for a recipe to make QuickDrying wet concrete blocks.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Remington’s Steel Ammo by Shouden Kalferas, Based on Khaine’s Steel Ammo**  
   * Description: Help the community stock up on 7.62 and 9mm ammo and learn the secret to creating steel ammo.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Rick Danger Auger by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Gather tons resources and some spare parts to receive a Rick Danger Auger…
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Spirit of Vengeance by Shouden Kalferas, based on Snufkin’s Vehicles and Zombies, with help from arramus and Slawa**  
   * Description: Help Johnny Blaze reclaim his soul by killing the embodiment of Mephistopholes.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Taza’s Axe by Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Mod**  
   * Description: Gather tons of stone and craft a bunch of Stone Axes to obtain a Taza’s Axe.
* **White River Tools of Citizenship – Molino Bulletproof Glass by arramus, with full credit to those who laid template foundations (Requested by Fuzzy Pug)**  
   * Description: Bring a supply of Bulletproof glass to the trader to receive a Clear Bulletproof Glass recipe or assets.
* **[Xal\_SetZombiesAttackAnimals](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombies-attack-animals/) by Xaliber, [Fixed](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/Xal_SetZombiesAttackAnimals) By ShoudenKalferas**  
   * Description: Allow zombies and zombie dogs to attack passive animals.
* **[ZLoot\_Increase](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-loot-bag-increase/) by Shouden Kalferas, Based on Donovan’s Longer Loot Bags and Mega Loot Bags**  
   * Description: Increase chance for Zombies to drop a loot bag, and keep it from disappearing for 15 minutes.
* **[Zombiepedia Skillpoints](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombiepedia-skill-points/) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Place encyclopedia books as random drops that give real tips and tricks, in exchange for one skillpoint for each book read.
* **[Donovan\_BetterBridges](https://7daystodiemods.com/better-bridges/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Allows advanced rotation on garage door and drawbridge.
* **[Donovan\_BetterBuffs](https://7daystodiemods.com/better-buffs/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Tweaks some of the (de)buff settings. Notably, NearTrauma now only lasts 10 minutes and hunger and thirsty are now more realistic.
* **[Donovan\_BetterDyes](https://7daystodiemods.com/better-dyes/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Craft dyes using paint.
* **[Donovan\_CraftSpikes](https://7daystodiemods.com/craft-spikes/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Adds the A16 Log Spikes back in as craftable items.
* **[Donovan\_LootCleanup](https://7daystodiemods.com/loot-clean-up/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Destroys certain containers after looting them, cleaning up the environment.
* **[Donovan\_PickMeUp](https://7daystodiemods.com/pick-me-up/) by Donovan**  
   * Description: Allows spike blocks to be picked up.
* **[wtk34\_water\_filter](https://7daystodiemods.com/wtk34-water-filter/) by wtk34**  
   * Description: A simple water filter for the game.
* **[Grenade Arrows](https://7daystodiemods.com/wtk34mods-grenade-arrow/) by wtk34, [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/zWTK34-Grenade_Arrows) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: This little mod adds a grenade tipped arrow to the game.
* **[JaxTeller718\_IncreasedBiomeZombiesx2](https://7daystodiemods.com/increased-wilderness-zombies/) by JaxTeller718**  
   * Description: All settings related to zombies.
* **[MorePaintTextures](https://7daystodiemods.com/more-paint-textures/) by Eric Beaudoin**  
   * Description: Add more textures to the paint tool.
* **[Weapon Repair Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/weapons-repair-mod/) by Survager [Modified](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7dtd-FixedModlets/tree/master/mod_rework_repair_weapons) by Shouden Kalferas**  
   * Description: Require parts of weapons in order to repair them.

## Changelog

Published new release: **A19.3\_1.0d**

* Bugfixes:  
   * Endless Screamers, caused by heatmap generation from Death by Campfire. Adjusted the mod to remove this feature.  
   * Fixed Localization on H7SB Seats & Storage
* Removed:  
   * More recieps by wolfbain5, as they were mostly duplicates of recipes other mods were providing  
   * zStorage (Big) by Eihwaz, as the storage containers were large enough without this
* Added:  
   * JaxTeller718\_IncreasedBiomeZombiesx2  
   * MorePaintTextures by Eric Beaudoin  
   * White River Tools of Citizenship – Molino Bulletproof Glass  
   * Weapon Repair Mod by Survager, to change weapon repair to take weapon parts

## Credits

All credits go to each original mod author. Most modders learn to create their own mods by looking at the work of others. In some cases, code is copied to create a new mod. Due to this, each modder is essentially standing on the shoulders of other authors. Most in the modding community, himself included, welcome others to look at how a mod was created and to use this code to any extent, provided that credit is provided back to the author whose work yours is based off of. In the spirit of this community, he has notated each author and always ensure to retain the original author’s information. This collection is meant to be nothing more than what it claims to be: A collection of his own and other people’s hard work put together in a single zip file to make it easy for players and server administrators to easy install mods into their games. Enjoy.

Tested with A19.3 & A19.4Exp.
